ComicInfo.Summary: In this fast paced, action-packed issue, Bombshell and TommTomm along with MI-5 Agent Wilkinson, uncover a Nazi spy ring that has "giant-sized" plans of their own. Nazi spy ringleader Klaus Von Bader receives a special delivery from SS Obergruppenf√ºhrer Hans Kammler: two "Todesbots", 8-foot-tall death-machine robots to take on the power of TommTomm! Could this be the extra muscle the Nazi spies need to claim victory over our allied forces? And what is the Nazi's newest wonder weapon: the "Haunebu"? If you like your comics with high doses of action, excitement, humor and fun just like the comics you used to love, check out Bombshell and TommTomm! You won't be disappointed!
